name: Greenest Dungeon
description:
Explore greenest dungeon and fight monsters.

Tips:

1) To attack a monster, choose a weapon by clicking on one of the four icons at the bottom. 

2) Then place the weapon in one of the empty slots under the monster. When a monster attacks, each empty slot reduces the player's health.

P.S. A game for DTF.RU game jam, made in seven days.  All art by Danil Svechkov (me). Sound effect from: freesound.org.
